name: it's easy isn't it (just take a step) (Demo)
name_original: it's easy isn't it (just take a step) (Demo)
description: You're the Hero, he's the Villain. Its the final battle; the fight that will determine the fate of your kingdom. And then a third party interrupts and traps you both underground. Now you have to work with your enemy to escape the underground world you've been trapped in. Have fun with that.
